In environment f, g : R -> R r : R H : Rbar_locally' r (fun y : R => f y <= g y) H0 : filterlim f (Rbar_locally' r) (Rbar_locally p_infty) eps : R -> Prop H3 : Rbar_locally p_infty eps Unable to unify "Rbar_locally' r (fun y : R => f y <= g y)" with "filtermap g (Rbar_locally' r) eps".

In environment H : forall r : R, r >= 0 -> Rabs r = r f, g : R -> R r : R H0 : filterlim f (Rbar_locally' r) (Rbar_locally p_infty) eps : R -> Prop M : R H1 : forall x : R, M < x -> eps x x : posreal H2 : forall y : R, ball r x y -> (y = r -> False) -> f y <= g y The term "eps" has type "R -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "R".

original: intros g f x H1 H2. unfold is_lim in *. intros eps H3. specialize (H1 (fun y : R => f y - eps <= g y)). destruct x. - destruct (H1 lr). + apply Rbar_locally_witness with (x - eps). intros y H6. apply H. rewrite Rabs_right. apply Rplus_lt_reg_r with eps.
